About

My name is Ikenna Darlington Ogbajie, Ikenna means the father’s strength in Igbo language. I am currently based in Lagos, Nigeria.

I am a full stack software developer with experience in DevOps and currently program with different languages (Scala, PHP, JavaScript). Other technologies I have worked with are Lift framework, Spark, D3.js, MySQL, Elasticsearch, MongoDB, CakePHP, React, HTML and CSS. I am interested in Machine learning and Data Visualization.

I enjoy learning new things and reading about quite a number of things and watching movies. I also like underdog stories (who doesn’t?) and product/ business strategy stories.

On the Web

I use idarlington (A combination of my first and middle name) as my user name on networks when available.
